dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2006 12:16 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; laurie@crazytourist.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright violation
Date: Thu, 5 Jan 2006 09:15:57 -0800 (PST)
From: Laurie Perry <cc>
Reply-To: laurie@crazytourist.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

One of your hosts, collegechick.net, has posted copyrighted material on her
website.

The material was taken directly from www.crazyauntpurl.com, in a column
dated December 28, 2005:
http://www.crazyauntpurl.com/archives/2005/12/lists_are_the_e.php

The material was reprinted, without permission or a link to my site, on the
following page:
http://collegechick.net/index.php?cat=1

Please advise.

Thank you,
Laurie Perry
crazyauntpurl.com


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDvWJIvK/XpJs6oyURAsOKAJ0f9jMVy0uCUc2+Xuz1aqpf3K+NhgCfbreW
gVhFBvlqqsOYQJ/AaE2VAZg=
=Iu9E
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
